message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd be a great fit for it. I'm asking for $220 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I believe I can offer you $170 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I could come down a bit to $200.  I think this product will really benefit you and  $200 is a fair price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose an offer of $190 for the product.
